    Oak Day Bench

    $1995
    Jenni Kayne is a California design studio with a focus on inviting neutrals, quality construction, and attention to detail, creating pieces that stand the test of time. Solid white oak wood is durable and hardwearing with a visible natural grain, making it less likely to show signs of wear or damage for a piece that's truly built for the ages. With perfect proportions, function, and form, this bench is made to live with you for years to come. 18.25” x 12.25” x 41”.

    Tab Dining Chair

    $1550
    Wren & Cooper, of Bucks County, Pennsylvania, consists of designers and makers of hardwood contemporary furniture. Their intent is to make fine contemporary furniture, as perfectly as possible from honest materials. Objects that are thoughtfully designed, highly functional and precisely crafted with a focus on simple profiles and graphic detail. Thick natural saddle leather back with handstitched tabs and a curved wood handle. Matching milled leather upholstered seat or hand carved wood seat. Traditional mortise and tenon construction, hand rubbed satin finish. 33" H x 18" W x 18" D.

    Hommage Grande Dining Table

    $2500
    With roots in the Småland forests, the designer Matti Carlson, in collaboration with Tre sekel, has created a table based on the geometric basic shapes. Refined details, a strong monumental expression in harmony with fine carpentry for the table into the future. 73cm H x 135 D.

    Mutto Cover Dining Chair

    $420
    By Thomas Bentzen, former designer at Louise Campell Studio, started his own studio Thomas Bentzen Industrial Design in 2010. Referencing the values of honest craftsmanship and Scandinavian materiality, the Cover Armchair is an elegant perspective on the timeless wooden armchair. With its curved backrest and folded armrest covers, the Cover Armchair explores the possibilites of oak wood veneer, paired with a deep comfort, modern expression and base in solid wood.

    $1250
    Wolf Wood Co is an agile custom furniture/cabinetry design and fabrication shop located in Grand Rapids, MI, specializing in the use of extraordinary materials to create built-to-last pieces with simple, distinctive design. Minimalist design meets substantial size, for a piece that leaves you staring. 60x30x16".
